message: My mind is still groggy with the aftermath of our passion, but I manage to lock eyes with Clear.
He blinks slowly... and smiles happily at me.

name: クリア
message: "...Aoba. Thank you."
The weakness in his voice makes my eyes burn. The tears I've been struggling to hold back burst free.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Don't... say stuff like that..."

name: クリア
message: "You made me... so happy. I got to hold you in my arms. I got to make love to you..."

name: クリア
message: "I really wish... I could have stayed with you forever... as a human..."

name: クリア
message: "But it's fine. I've had more than my fair share of happiness."

name: クリア
message: "But I'm not going to say that I was happy, because I'm still happy and will always be happy."

name: クリア
message: "So... Ngh, gah!"
Clear groans. Sparks fly from his exposed parts.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Clear...!"

name: クリア
message: "I'm... fi...ne... Please... tell me..."
Smoke rises from his body. I smell something burning.

What do I do?
What do I do?!
I'm starting to panic, but I crush the urge to scream and nod my assent. Whatever Clear wants, I will give it to him.

name: クリア
message: "D-Did I... touch you... like a human would?"

name: クリア
message: "Did I do it... right?"
I can't say anything. The lump in my throat is too thick. But I try anyway. I try to make the words come.
I need to answer him.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Of course you did! You were more human than me... than anyone... than anyone... ngh..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You're human... you're human... Clear!"
A smile slowly appears on Clear's lips.

It's a warm smile, from the bottom of his heart...
A truly gentle smile.

name: クリア
message: "Aoba... during the fight with Alpha... you used Scrap on me, didn't you?"

name: クリア
message: "It's so strange... I'm a machine, but..."
...That's right. I did use Scrap on Clear back then.
That's when I found myself inside that weird space. Almost like I was inside Clear's song...

name: クリア
message: "I was thinking... My desire to keep you safe... I think you could call that my soul."

name: クリア
message: "When I felt you enter my mind... I was so happy. It felt so warm."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Clear..."
Clear lets out a pained sigh, but his smile doesn't falter.

name: クリア
message: "...I always figured death would be something cold. I was so sad when Grandpa died..."

name: クリア
message: "He went to sleep... and never woke up again... That's why I always felt so anxious when you went to sleep..."

name: クリア
message: "But I guess death is actually warm... huh..."

name: クリア
message: "Aoba... Thank you."
And then...<K> Clear stops moving.
He's still smiling that contented smile as the light slowly fades from his eyes.
He'll never speak to me again...
He'll never call me "Master" again... or "Aoba"...
I knew this would happen.
I was prepared for it...<k> but still.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Ngh, ugh... Ughh... Uuhh..."
Cradling Clear's head in my hands, I press my lips to his exposed frame.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Rest well... Clear."
